name: Software QA Team Lead
description:
WayRay is not an average startup — we are a vertically integrated deep-tech company that is leading the world in holographic AR. We are currently looking for deep-tech-minded go-getters to join our team of brilliant, ambitious professionals.

As a team, we push ourselves every day to solve the seemingly impossible. Our company culture is unlike any other, and that is why we are #1 in holography. If you like a good challenge, if you are ready to give everything you have got, then we are happy to have you. We can't promise it is going to be easy, but we promise you will have something big to show for it.

We are looking for a Software QA Team Lead to be a key member of the QA department. In this role, your primary goal will be to lead the testing QA team for our key software product – the AR Rendering Engine – a system that works at the intersection of modern navigation, data processing and augmented reality visualization technologies.

Key goals

  • Evaluate and improve the automated and manual product test process
  • Build and coach the team, active involvement in the hiring process
  • Process daily routines for the team: resource allocation, work planning, execution/progress tracking, syncs with other teams.
  • Build effective communication with other teams (devs, integration, DevOps, it, etc).
  • Automate QA activities and implement necessary frameworks
  • Settle the process for the up to date test documentation
  • Implement automotive industry quality standards into the software development process
  • Develop/design full-scale test strategies and plans

Essential skills

General

  • Degree or diploma in computer science, engineering, or it/math/physics
  • Wide tech background
  • 5 years in QA, at least 2 years lead experience
  • Fluent English (B2/C1 or better)

Management and people skills

  • Proven record of people management skills (with teams of 5 or more people)
  • Experience in building and improving workflows and tool-chain
  • Excellent communication (oral and written) and interpersonal skill
  • Ability to keep your spirits high in the situation of risk, pressure, and uncertainty
  • Practical experience with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
  • Hands-on experience with the toolset: Jira, Confluence, Jenkins, Trello, test-track

Technical skills

  • Python and test automation tools
  • Linux, bash
  • Git, Jenkins

Domain skills

  • Domain knowledge in automotive (self-driving, HMI) or navigation applications, AR/VR, or driving simulators - nice to have
  • ASpice and ISTQB certificates are a plus

What we offer

  • A unique project with cutting-edge technologies
  • Competitive salary and bonus for outstanding results
  • Opportunity to work in a multinational company with distributed teams
  • Comfortable office close to the city center.
  • Perfect opportunity to improve your English and learn Deutsch
  • Transparency and openness at all levels
  • Immersion in the Deep Tech culture where we give birth to real innovations
  • Benefits package including paid educational opportunities and stock option plan for all positions and grades, health insurance
  • Yearly big party and regular corporate events
  • Team-building events and sport activities
